about_the_game:
Coming to a computer near you!
An infected GPU has invaded and begun destroying the world within a computer, and now it’s up to our brave hero Commander Prompt to stop him! He’ll stop at nothing to take down the mad Gonathan P. Ulysses, but will he be able to make it to him before he breaks everything?

Join Commander Prompt on a fast-paced adventure taking you through the world inside your computer, using everything around you to solve the puzzles scattered within!

Hack the world!
Your trusty tool against Gonathan’s arsenal of traps and tricks is your ability to hack the world around you. Use this ability to change gravity, teleport, turn your foes into your allies, and more to navigate the obstacles stopping you from chasing down the dastardly Mr. Ulysses!

Beat the clock!
Every level is a race against the clock! Explore every corner to find the secrets that can save you time. Can you prove that you’re better than the best and claim the ever-coveted “platinum” trophy (or, perhaps, something even better)?

But be careful, because he’s watching…
Gonathan’s not going to go down without a fight! He’ll block your view with pop-up ads, trigger sounds to distract you, mess with your controls, and so much worse just to stop you. Will you be able to survive his madness?

Get a good laugh out of it!
Let humor reign supreme as Gonathan and Commander Prompt engage in witty back-and-forth banter! Engage in a laugh-out-loud story of a too-serious-for-this-world action hero facing off against an insane jokester!

highlighted.name: It was a typical day at the office
We have a city to hack.
How can you hate from outside the club?

name: Byte Hack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-750 Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Byte Hack is a fast-paced puzzle platformer about hacking your way through an infected computer tower. Change gravity, teleport, control your enemies, and more to navigate each level. Be quick on your feet and sharp in your mind to solve the puzzles before the contaminated GPU destroys the computer!
